titlestmt.titleproper: Joseph and Clara Cole marriage publication 1977.415
titlestmt.author: Nicholas Pavlik
titlestmt.sponsor: This collection was originally processed and described as part of the project, "Uncovering the Secrets of Brooklyn's 19th Century Past: Creation to Consolidation," funded by the Council on Library and Information Resources, with additional support from The Gladys Krieble Delmas Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2023-11-28 21:27:58 +0000.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Joseph and Clara Cole marriage publication
did.abstract: One publication containing the text of the marriage ceremony of Joseph G. Cole and Clara C. (Naylor) Cole, administered by James D. Phelps on April 25, 1906.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection consists of a single item.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Identification of item, date (if known); Joseph and Clara Cole marriage publication, 1977.415, Box and Folder number; Brooklyn Public Library, Center for Brooklyn History.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This collection was rehoused and the finding aid revised by Dee Bowers in 2023.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One publication containing the text of the marriage ceremony of Joseph G. Cole and Clara C. (Naylor) Cole, administered by James D. Phelps on April 25, 1906. The marriage certificate of Joseph and Clara Cole is included in the publication.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This item is in the public domain. While many items at the Center for Brooklyn History are unrestricted, we do not own reproduction rights to all materials. Be aware of the several kinds of rights that might apply: copyright, licensing and trademarks. The researcher assumes all responsibility for copyright questions.
